# libraries
```{r}

library(haven)
library(modelr)
library(readxl)
library(Rcpp)
library(httpuv)
library(shiny)
library(plotly)
```

### renaming local efficiency

# merging files
```{r}
eff_loc_all_thr <-
  left_join(eff_loc_th.1_wide,
            eff_loc_th.12_wide,
            by = "ELS_ID")
eff_loc_all_thr <-
  left_join(eff_loc_all_thr,
            eff_loc_th.14_wide,
            by = "ELS_ID")
eff_loc_all_thr <-
  left_join(eff_loc_all_thr,
            eff_loc_th.16_wide,
            by = "ELS_ID")
eff_loc_all_thr <-
  left_join(eff_loc_all_thr,
            eff_loc_th.18_wide,
            by = "ELS_ID") %>%
  mutate(ELS_ID = factor(ELS_ID))
eff_loc_all_thr <-
  left_join(eff_loc_all_thr,
            eff_loc_th.2_wide,
            by = "ELS_ID")
```

# now do the gathering and spreading
```{r long then wide}
# gather
eff_loc_all_thr_long <- 
  eff_loc_all_thr %>%
  group_by(ELS_ID) %>%
  gather(roi, eff_loc_value, 
         lMFG_L_27_.10:vmPu_R_230_.20) %>%
  separate(col = roi, c("roi", "thresh"), "[.]")
# spread
eff_loc_all_thr_wide <-
  eff_loc_all_thr_long %>%
  spread(thresh, eff_loc_value)  %>%
  mutate(roi = 
           str_sub(roi, 1, str_length(roi)-1)
  )

```

# viz
```{r}
# hist_theme
dist_plot <-
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    axis.text = element_text(size = 10),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 12)
  )
dist_facet <-
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    strip.text = element_text(size = 8),
    axis.text.x = element_text(size = 8, angle = 60, hjust = 1),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 8),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 12)
  )
dist_x_labels <-
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90,
                               size = 4)
  )
```


```{r dist degree w thresh}
# degree by threshold
dist_eff_loc_by_thresh <- 
  eff_loc_all_thr_long %>%
  mutate(
    thresh = as.factor(thresh)
  ) %>%
  ggplot(.,
         aes(x=roi, y=eff_loc_value)
         ) +
  geom_col(alpha = .5, position = "dodge") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = function(x) format(x, big.mark = ".", decimal.mark = ",")) +
  dist_plot +
  facet_wrap(~thresh,
             ncol = 2,
             nrow = 4) +
  dist_facet +
    dist_x_labels
dist_eff_loc_by_thresh
```

# area under curve

```{r}
thresh1 <- .10
thresh2 <- .12
thresh3 <- .14
thresh4 <- .16
thresh5 <- .18
thresh6 <- .20
eff_loc_all_thr_wide <-
  eff_loc_all_thr_wide %>%
    rename(.,
           "th.1" = `10`,
           "th.12" = `12`,
           "th.14" = `14`,
           "th.16" = `16`,
           "th.18" = `18`,
           "th.20" = `20`) %>%
  mutate(
    th1toth2 =
      thresh2 - thresh1,
    th2toth3 =
      thresh3 - thresh2,
    th3toth4 =
      thresh4 - thresh3,
    th4toth5 =
      thresh5 - thresh4,
    th5toth6 =
      thresh6 - thresh5
  )
```

### creating aucs
```{r creating amyg auc}
# amyg
amyg_auc <-
  amyg %>%
  mutate(
    amyg_auc1 = th1toth2 * ((th.1 + th.12) / 2),
    amyg_auc2 = th2toth3 * ((th.12 + th.14) / 2),
    amyg_auc3 = th3toth4 * ((th.14 + th.16) / 2),
    amyg_auc4 = th4toth5 * ((th.16 + th.18) / 2),
    amyg_auc5 = th5toth6 * ((th.18 + th.20) / 2)
  ) %>%
  ungroup(ELS_ID) %>%
  mutate(ELS_ID = as.factor(ELS_ID))
amyg_auc$amyg_S_AUCg <-rowSums(amyg_auc[, c("amyg_auc1","amyg_auc2","amyg_auc3","amyg_auc4","amyg_auc5")])

# back to wide format
amyg_auc_wide <-
  amyg_auc %>%
  select(ELS_ID, roi, amyg_S_AUCg) %>%
  spread(roi, amyg_S_AUCg)

```

```{r mPFtha}
  mpftha %>%
  mutate(
    mpftha_auc1 = th1toth2 * ((th.1 + th.12) / 2),
    mpftha_auc2 = th2toth3 * ((th.12 + th.14) / 2),
    mpftha_auc3 = th3toth4 * ((th.14 + th.16) / 2),
    mpftha_auc4 = th4toth5 * ((th.16 + th.18) / 2),
    mpftha_auc5 = th5toth6 * ((th.18 + th.20) / 2)
  ) %>%
  ungroup(ELS_ID) %>%
  mutate(ELS_ID = as.factor(ELS_ID))
mpftha_auc$mpftha_S_AUCg <-rowSums(mpftha_auc[, c("mpftha_auc1","mpftha_auc2","mpftha_auc3","mpftha_auc4","mpftha_auc5")]) 

# back to wide format
mpftha_auc_wide <-
  mpftha_auc %>%
  select(ELS_ID, roi, mpftha_S_AUCg) %>%
  spread(roi, mpftha_S_AUCg)
```
